    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ActionCommand
    ActionCommand class - Encapsulates undo/redo operations using lambda functions.
    Actions
    Actions class - Handles user authentication and file persistence.
    AdminAuth
    AdminAuth class - Manages administrative authentication and password changes.
    AdminPanel
    AdminPanel is a JFrame window that provides administrative functionality for managing user accounts.
    BinManager
    BinManager class - Manages deleted items using a queue data structure.
    DashboardFrame
     
    FavouriteCard
    FavouriteCard is a custom JPanel component that displays a favorite media item.
    FavouriteItem
    FavouriteItem class - Represents a single favorite item in a linked list structure.
    FavouriteItem.NodeHandler
    Functional interface for handling nodes during traversal.
    Main
    Main class - Entry point for the myMemo application.
    MediaItems
    MediaItems class - Abstract base class for all media items (photos, videos, etc).
    MediaStorage<T>
    MediaStorage class - Abstract generic storage for media items.
    MediaStorage.Media
    Abstract base class representing a media item.
    MyQueue<T>
    MyQueue class - Generic queue implementation using circular array.
    MyStack<T>
    MyStack class - Generic stack implementation using array.
    Photo
    Photo class - Represents a photograph in the application.
    PhotoManager
    PhotoManager class - Manages photo collection with sorting and search operations.
    PhotoStorage
    PhotoStorage class - Manages storage and operations on photo collections.
    PhotoStorage.Photo
    Inner Photo class - Represents a simple photo with title and path.
    SigninFrame
    SigninFrame is the authentication window for the myMemo application.
    UndoRedoManager
    UndoRedoManager class - Manages undo/redo functionality using two stacks.
    UserInfo
    UserInfo class - Represents user account information.
    Video
    Video class - Represents a video in the application.
